Arasaka WSSA Sniper System.name: Arasaka WSSA Sniper System
Arasaka WSSA Sniper System.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. +1 to Attack.

Chadran Arms City Reaper.name: Chadran Arms City Reaper
Chadran Arms City Reaper.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Chadran Arms Jungle Reaper.name: Chadran Arms Jungle Reaper
Chadran Arms Jungle Reaper.description: A standard-issue assault rifle. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Dai Lung Magnum.name: Dai Lung Magnum
Dai Lung Magnum.description: A concealable, heavy pistol. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Dai Lung Streetmaster.name: Dai Lung Streetmaster
Dai Lung Streetmaster.description: A concealable, medium-sized pistol. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Eagletech Bearcat.name: Eagletech Bearcat
Eagletech Bearcat.description:
A collapsible bow branded with the Eagletech logo, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

+1 to Attack check.

Eagletech Scorpion.name: Eagletech Scorpion
Eagletech Scorpion.description:
A sleek crossbow branded with the Eagletech logo, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

+1 to Attack check.

Eagletech Striker.name: Eagletech Striker
Eagletech Striker.description: A crossbow branded with the Eagletech logo, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

Eagletech Tomcat.name: Eagletech Tomcat
Eagletech Tomcat.description: A revitalized bow branded with the Eagletech logo, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

Federated Arms Super Chief.name: Federated Arms Super Chief
Federated Arms Super Chief.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Federated Arms Tech-Assault III.name: Federated Arms Tech-Assault III
Federated Arms Tech-Assault III.description: A concealable SMG. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

GunMart Home Defender.name: GunMart Home Defender
GunMart Home Defender.description: An all-purpose shotgun. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

GunMart Hunter.name: GunMart Hunter
GunMart Hunter.description:
A poor quality crossbow branded with the GunMart logo, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the weapon jams and requires using an action to clear.

GunMart Sherwood.name: GunMart Sherwood
GunMart Sherwood.description:
A poor quality bow branded with the GunMart logo, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the weapon jams and requires using an action to clear.

GunMart Snipe-Star.name: GunMart Snipe-Star
GunMart Snipe-Star.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Militech Boomer Buster.name: Militech Boomer Buster
Militech Boomer Buster.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.

Militech Hotshot.name: Militech Hotshot
Militech Hotshot.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. +1 to Attack.

Militech Mini-Grenade.name: Militech Mini-Grenade
Militech Mini-Grenade.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this.

Militech Urban.name: Militech Urban
Militech Urban.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage.

Militech Viper.name: Militech Viper
Militech Viper.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.

Nomad Long Rifle.name: Nomad Long Rifle
Nomad Long Rifle.description: A long-distance sniper rifle, commonly used by nomads. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine.

Sternmeyer P-35.name: Sternmeyer P-35
Sternmeyer P-35.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed.

Sternmeyer SMG-21.name: Sternmeyer SMG-21
Sternmeyer SMG-21.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed.

Towa Manufacturing Type-G.name: Towa Manufacturing Type-G
Towa Manufacturing Type-G.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Towa Manufacturing Type-R.name: Towa Manufacturing Type-R
Towa Manufacturing Type-R.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Tsunami Arms Type-18.name: Tsunami Arms Type-18
Tsunami Arms Type-18.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. +1 to Attack.
